channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: JetBlue partners with Vrbo, allowing TrueBlue earnings on Paisly home rentals
item.description: There’s a new way to earn miles with a major U.S. airline when you stay at a vacation rental property. On Monday, JetBlue announced a new partnership ...

item.title: Get double bonus American AAdvantage miles with this limited-time cruise offer

item.title: Flighty app gets an upgrade: Why this flight-tracking app is a go-to travel companion

item.title: Disney World closing 2 classic attractions to make way for ‘Cars’ addition to Magic Kingdom
